attributes.action: Instruct the operators of the commercial muliplexes (MUX's) to provide their service to all 1154 main transmitters and relays in the united Kingdom
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: After digital switchover the majority of sites will only transmit the 3 Publc service multiplexes whilst main sites will transmit 6 multiplexes, why should people suffer a poorer service because a Hill is in the way of the main transmitter. All transmission sites should transmit all 6 multiplexes and give us all the full range of channels. please support this petition
